about_the_game:
In the far reaches of the extinct land of men, darkness has ravaged every sign of life. The lost souls of bloodthirsty warriors seek rest in the underworld, where the demons of the abyss, the darkest creatures, and soulless sorcerers dwell. Darkness hangs over the whole land and there is hardly a glimpse of light. There is no solace for life. But in the high mountains of Selender, a halo of hope has arisen.

A living soul has received his commission. A valiant one to light the lands of night, the dark lands. This is your mission, bearer of The Last Flame.



The Bearer & The Last Flame is a dark fantasy action adventure. Darkness has ravaged the lands of men. Creatures of the night, demons, and the soulless dead roam the confines of the dark realm. Only a glimmer of light hovers over the hills of Inserland. The castles of ancient kings given way to the abodes of the darkest beasts.

You are the bearer of the last light of the world. The last flame.

In your hands is the courage, the determination and your courage to defeat the darkness of the five kingdoms. It is your mission, to transport the last flame, and return the creatures and beasts to their realm of darkness.



5 different locations, each with unique enemies and weapons.

Variety of NPCs and side quests.

Variety of weapons, items and enemies.
